required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Glycocalyx in COVID-19 Patients. A Pilot Study
clinical_study.official_title: The Glycocalyx in COVID-19 Patients. A Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: The damage of the endothelial glycocalyx is based on microvascular endothelial dysfunction and typical for critical clinical conditions like sepsis, trauma, bleeding, shock, as well as ARDS. We aim to generate first hints regarding the impact of covid-19 disease on the (damage) of the endothelial glycocalyx. Furthermore, we want to investigate the potential coagulopathies, which go along with shedding of the glycocalyx. The detection of and the relation between the severity of the disease, as well as the extent of the glycocalyx damage during the observational period, as well as the hemostatic alterations, are aim of the study.

detailed_description.textblock: The damage of the endothelial glycocalyx is based on microvascular endothelial dysfunction and typical for critical clinical conditions like sepsis, trauma, bleeding, shock, as well as ARDS. We aim to generate first hints regarding the impact of covid-19 disease on the (damage) of the endothelial glycocalyx. Furthermore, we want to investigate the potential coagulopathies, which go along with shedding of the glycocalyx. The detection of and the relation between the severity of the disease, as well as the extent of the glycocalyx damage during the observational period, as well as the hemostatic alterations, are aim of the study.Circulating plasma syndecan-1 is measured as surrogat parameter for the extent of the glycocalyx damage.

primary_outcome.description: circulating plasma syndecan-1 as surrogat parameter for endothelial damage is measures

arm_group.description: Patients diagnosed with and hospitalized due to COVID-19. Subgroups: ICU admitted COVID-19 + patients vs COVID 19 pts. at normal ward-

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed and hospitalized with COVID 19 due to clinical symptoms.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- COVID-19 detected by PCR measures going along with clinical symptoms
- age > 18 years
Exclusion Criteria:
- refusal of study participation

overall_official.affiliation: Medical University of Vienna, Department of Anesthesia, Intensive Care Medicine and Pain Medicine
